snippet: Mr. Geffen, the entertainment magnate, is giving $100 million to help pay for the renovation of the home of the New York Philharmonic.
abstract: Entertainment mogul David Geffen will donate $100 million to help fund renovation of Lincoln Center's Avery Fisher Hall, home of New York Philharmonic; after lengthy naming rights battle with Fisher family, concert building will be renamed David Geffen Hall in September 2015, with plans to start construction in 2019; gift highlights Geffen's entryway into small list of elite donors that support New York City's greatest cultural institutions.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Geffen, the entertainment magnate, is giving $100 million to help pay for the renovation of the home of the New York Philharmonic.
